<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>List Repository List</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/code/api/v1/repositories"}></MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve a list of integrated repositories.
each repository item includes: id, repoName, source, owner, isPublic, creationDate

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Query Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"in":"query","name":"errorsCount","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

repositories for customer
